welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pahrump, the charming desert oasis known for its stunning scenery and warm hospitality! We invite you to explore our unique city and enjoy all it has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nellis AFB Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for military personnel and their families traveling through Nellis AFB Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Desert Rock Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Desert Rock Airport provides exclusive services for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
